name: The Worst Platformer Ever! (1st Chapter)
description:
Help Cubey get the milk from the Free Milk Stand. Avoid the spikes and jump over obstacles. Please play this game. xD. I'm still making the 2nd chapter so don't stay tuned for that because its gonna be worse like this one. There are just 6 levels currently. (Like I'm ever going to update this game, xD)

Bug: If the character is stuck like on the sky or something just reload the page to counter this bug. I can't fix it because I don't know. Maybe it's because the y levels but it doesn't make sense.
